decision:
Create an AgentTemplate base class in backend/agents/template.py that allows dynamic agent creation. Include:
- BaseAgentTemplate class with role, config, and analyze method
- Auto-registration mechanism that scans agents/ directory
- register_agent() function for dynamic loading
- Example template for PerformanceAgent
- Update backend/agents/registry.py to support dynamic agent loading
- Add tests in tests/test_agent_template.py
